DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study quantify change ankle knee motion force result five progressive modification anterior-posterior trim line thermoformed ankle-foot orthoses ( AFO ) . It hypothesize AFO anterior trim line prevent plantar flexion load response ( first 10 % gait cycle ) prevent dorsiflexion terminal stance ( 30 50 % gait cycle ) compare non-device condition . This evidence sagittal plane ankle motion ground reaction force magnitude location load response terminal stance . Additionally , angular velocity knee flexion increase period . By contrast , trim line move posterior result lower effective stiffness device result progressive increase dorsiflexion allow increase amount knee flexion terminal stance .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Ankle-foot Orthoses Trim Line Modifications Ankle Knee Motion Force .
DOC.criteria: Participants must know pathology would affect ambulatory ability . Age great equal 18 year , less 40 year . Ability tolerate walk minimum 100 yard course three half hour time period . No current skin breakdown sore either low extremity . Use ambulatory aid cane crutch . Any medical psychological condition could jeopardize subject 's participation compliance study protocol .
